contents:
你的翻译有误
萨格尔王的音译来自Sucker

剑桥辞典这样说：
(slang) a person who is easily fooled or is stupid enough to do something

牛津词典给出了进一步解释：
a person who is easily tricked or persuaded to do something
还有一个意思是：
person who cannot resist somebody/something or likes somebody/something very much

这不就是量身定制吗？
你们这些解读出现偏差的人
都是有一本帐的！
